The 15 ChatGPT Buttons to Master (May 2025)

☑ 1: Toggle on/off left-side menu.
☑ 2: Choose different models (best = o3).
☑ 3: Temporary chats (exclude your memory).
☑ 4: Search chats to find past conversations.
☑ 5: Library of images you generated before.
☑ 6: Library of GPTs from others (+ your own).
☑ 7: Sora to generate videos with ChatGPT.
☑ 8: Project to have conversations on one topic.
☑ 9: Create an image with a simple prompt (= text).
☑ 10: Toggle "Search the web" to force web search.
☑ 11: Force "Canva" mode to write or code easily.
☑ 12: Create a full 10-20 page report from research.
☑ 13: The "+" is to attach photo / csv / pdf / in bulk.
☑ 14: The mic to transcribe what you say into text.
☑ 15: The "voice mode" to actually talk to ChatGPT.
